name: Wanda Day
text: Crazy company to work for very dishonest people

resp.text:
Thank you for your comment.  Your thoughts are very important to us and especially concerning as we strive to focus on our CORE BUSINESS VALUES: Excellence, Reliability, Respect, Safety, and Honesty.
We would like to hear more about your experience and invite you to email us at hr@processbarron.com to allow us the opportunity to address your concerns.

name: TEAM OMEGA
text: Low pay. They told me $22 per hour after I weld tested. Thats journeyman pay.
